Package neureka.abstraction

Class AbstractNDArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • neureka.abstraction.AbstractComponentOwner
      • neureka.abstraction.AbstractNDArray
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Tsr
    public abstract class AbstractNDArray
extends AbstractComponentOwner
    This is the precursor class to the final Tsr class from which tensor instances can be created. The inheritance model of a tensor is structured as follows: Tsr inherits from AbstractNDArray which inherits from AbstractComponentOwner The inheritance model is linear, meaning that all classes involved are not extended more than once.
